content: darn knit stripe it stripes we love them you will too with this cowl knit in the round with one skein of the self- striping yarn uneek instructions m aterials cast on 108 stitches place a marker and join in round slip marker as you come to it needle us 7 16 circular row 1-8 work a k2 p2 rib yarn - 1 skein urth yarns uneek worsted row 9 + knit each round until 3 yards remain or enough shown in color 4014 yarn to bind off size bind off loosely purlwise weave in ends 12 x 22 enjoy gauge 20 stitches/4 inches in stockinette abbreviations k=knit p=purl ©2017 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting darnknitanyway com emailing this pattern to others or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited 651 342 1386
